verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Absalom <S%H53><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> are they increased <S%H7231><s%> that trouble <S%H6862><s%> me! many <S%H7227><s%> are they that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there be which say <S%H559><s%> of my soul, <S%H5315><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God. <S%H430><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But thou, <S%H859><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> art a shield <S%H4043><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> me; my glory, <S%H3519><s%> and the lifter up <S%H7311><s%> of mine head. <S%H7218><s%>

I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> laid me down <S%H7901><s%> and slept; <S%H3462><s%> I awaked; <S%H6974><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sustained <S%H5564><s%> me.

I will not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten thousands <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7233><s%> of people, <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me round about. <S%H5439><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me, O my God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%> upon the cheek bone; <S%H3895><s%> thou hast broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the ungodly. <S%H7563><s%>
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongeth unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> thy blessing <S%H1293><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> thy people. <S%H5971><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
